p:
LLM-105, with four formula units per unit cell, is a highly dense molecular solid that crystallizes in a monoclinic, P2 1/ n space symmetry group. It exhibits an extensive network of HBs and π–π stacking in its crystal structure as shown in Figure 1 a, which was drawn by mercury 3.9.
31 The topology of the LLM-105 molecule has been displayed in Figure 1 b, which possesses only one stable conformation in the gas phase. The corresponding atom types are presented in Figure 1 c. It is noted that a few atom types are applied for the FF construction.
